about_the_game:
Get it if you like Wurroom and want to support futher development...


Hello, Traveler!
Thank you so much for visiting the strange worlds of the Wurroom! We hope you enjoy this journey.

We want to say that all we do - is for You. And there is no greater reward than to see people playing our game.
These aren't just polite words. For us, games are true interactive art, and art needs attentive and sensitive witnesses.
So, if you've playing Wurroom - you already done the greatest thing.

But, if you have a sincere and pure desire to help further development, you can get this DLC. It contains 35 pages Art Book and a few screenshots.
It's just a way to say "thank you" to those who think the game is worth some money.

And, no doubt, it will help us to release the next game - Ultra Strangeness, which we develope without any funding, with pure enthusiasm.

Good luck to you, Traveler! May the universe lead you in mysterious ways.
